eg.document

Interface EditingStateReadable


  • public interface EditingStateReadable
    The interface to read parameters related to the state of the document while it is edited

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setCursorPosition(int line, int col)
      Sets the numbers of the line and the column where the cursor is located
      void setInChangeState(boolean b)
      Sets the boolean that, if true, indicates that the document is in change.
      void setSelectionState(boolean b)
      Sets the boolean that indicates if text is currenty selected
      void setUndoableState(boolean canUndo, boolean canRedo)
      Sets the booleans that indicate if edits can be redone and/or undone

    • Method Detail

      • setInChangeState

        void setInChangeState(boolean b)
        Sets the boolean that, if true, indicates that the document is in change. False indicates that the "in change state" is reset which should be the case when the documents text is saved.
        Parameters:
        b - the boolean value

      • setUndoableState

        void setUndoableState(boolean canUndo,
                      boolean canRedo)
        Sets the booleans that indicate if edits can be redone and/or undone
        Parameters:
        canUndo - the boolean value for undoable edits
        canRedo - the boolean value for redobale edits

      • setSelectionState

        void setSelectionState(boolean b)
        Sets the boolean that indicates if text is currenty selected
        Parameters:
        b - the boolean value

      • setCursorPosition

        void setCursorPosition(int line,
                       int col)
        Sets the numbers of the line and the column where the cursor is located
        Parameters:
        line - the line number
        col - the column number
